analysis.key_quote: Such a conversion would transfer the loyalties of such employees from the regulations, policies and mission of their respective agencies to the periodic fluctuating whims of elected officials.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of civil service positions to 'at-will' employees, highlighting concerns about politicization and the loss of continuity and efficiency, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
